data.title: Alaska Tourism Awards: Honoring Excellence with Sharing Alaska
data.meta_description: Sharing Alaska celebrates the luminaries of the Alaska tourism industry. Discover the 7 esteemed awardees recognized for their outstanding achievements at our annual banquet. Learn more!
data.text:
Alaska's Digital Storyteller of the Year Award: presented to individuals who seamlessly blend creativity with technology to tell their story of Alaska's landscapes, traditions, and adventures. The Digital Storyteller of the Year is someone who, through various digital platforms, paints a vibrant picture of Alaska, drawing audiences into the heart of this magnificent land.

Alaska's Influencer of the Year Award: presented to influential individuals who harness the power of social media (platform(s) indifferent) to advocate for, promote, or represent life in Alaska. The Influencer of the Year is someone who, with authenticity and passion, engages and inspires a vast audience, making Alaska a must-visit destination in the hearts of many.

Alaska's Photographer of the Year Award: presented to the visionary who, through their lens, captures the breathtaking beauty, raw emotion, and untamed spirit of Alaska. This award recognizes an individual whose photos transcend the visual, telling profound stories and evoking a deep connection to the Alaskan wilderness and its people.

Alaska's Videographer of the Year Award: Honoring the cinematographic artists who bring Alaska to life on screen (no matter the size of the screen!), this award celebrates those who masterfully depict the rhythm, hues, and soul of the state. From soaring aerials to intimate ground shots, the Videographer of the Year crafts visual symphonies that resonate with both residents and global audiences alike.
